name: Shutter Chaos
description: In Shutter Chaos you are F. Daniel a world renowned school yearbook photographer. As a 20 year veteran, you know all the tricks of the trade and nothing can get in your way except for some students who just aren’t posing properly. Use your vast experience to remedy the situation by helping the students into their parents preferred poses. Unfortunately, someone borrowed your camera and was probably using it wrong because the timer is stuck in the 10 second position and you can’t stop if from taking the pictures. Work quickly to maneuver the subjects perfectly into frame so that you don’t waste any of your precious film.
